A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
92% from critics??!!! Im a huge fan of Star Wars and in general I love good cinema. This was quite simply just a bad movie. Geez\, where to begin. 

The Story: Painfully bad. 3 hrs Ill never get back. The plot made no sense and took Little to no effort on the part of the writers. The characters were put into situations you simply dont care about and you knew they would escape from. Just wanted plain bad. 

The music: what the hell? Its loud\, basic orchestra music that reminds you of a bad Indiana Jones flick and no original Star Wars score. It was so loud and annoying that it kept taking me out of the few decent scenes there were. Totally distracting.

I dont know what they were thinking when they made this movie and I really dont know what the critics were thinking when they gave it positive reviews. I know there is some major conspiracy theory around why the user reviews are so low but having just left the theater this is the first time Ive been moved enough to actually write a review. Its simply that bad.
